0: Donald Trump has launched a campaign initiative seeking volunteer "observers" to prevent his Democratic rival Hillary Clinton from "rigging" the November presidential election. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "Help Me Stop Crooked Hillary From Rigging This Election!" an apparently new page on the Republican candidate's official website says. "Please fill out this form to receive more information about becoming a volunteer Trump Election Observer." NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The form collects users' contact information, then directs them to a donations form.
